main module¶

The main request handler. All dynamic requests except for remote_api are handled by this handler, which dispatches to all other dynamic handlers.

class main.Main¶

Bases: google.appengine.ext.webapp._webapp25.RequestHandler

The main request handler. All dynamic requests except for remote_api are handled by this handler, which dispatches to all other dynamic handlers.

get()¶
head()¶
initialize(request, response)¶
post()¶
serve()¶
main.flush_caches(*keywords)¶

Flushes the specified set of caches. Pass ‘*’ to flush everything.

main.get_hidden_input_tags_for_preserved_query_params(request)¶

Gets HTML with <input type=”hidden”> tags to preserve query parameters listed in utils.PRESERVED_QUERY_PARAM_NAMES e.g. “ui”.

main.get_language_option(request, lang, is_selected)¶
main.get_language_options(request, config, current_lang)¶

Returns a list of information needed to generate the language menu.

main.get_localized_message(localized_messages, lang, default)¶

Gets the localized message for lang from a dictionary that maps language codes to localized messages. Falls back to English if language ‘lang’ is not available, or to a default message if English is not available.

main.get_repo_and_action(request)¶

Determines the repo and action for a request. The action is the part of the URL path after the repo, with no leading or trailing slashes.

main.get_repo_options(request, lang)¶

Returns a list of the names and titles of the launched repositories.

main.get_secret(name)¶

Gets a secret from the datastore by name, or returns None if missing.

main.is_cron_task(request)¶

Returns True if the request is from appengine cron.

main.is_development_server()¶

Returns True if the app is running in development.

main.is_task_queue_task(request)¶

Returns True if the request is from the appengine task queue.

main.select_charset(request)¶

Given a request, chooses a charset for encoding the response.

If the selected charset is UTF-8, it always returns ‘utf-8’ (const.CHARSET_UTF8), not ‘utf8’, ‘UTF-8’, etc.

main.select_lang(request, config=None)¶

Selects the best language to use for a given request. The ‘lang’ query parameter has priority, then the django_language cookie, then the first language in the language menu, then the default setting.

main.setup_env(request)¶

Constructs the ‘env’ object, which contains various template variables that are commonly used by most handlers.
